byline.contributor: Susanne Craig and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

abstract: Clinton Correctional Facility employee Lyle Mitchell says his wife Joyce E Mitchell, who also worked at prison and is accused of helping Richard W Matt and David Sweat escape, was involved in escape plot but later backed out and that Matt and Sweat had made threats against his life.
lead_paragraph: Lyle Mitchell said that his wife, Joyce E. Mitchell, was drawn to the inmates by the “attention” they gave her but realized she was in over her head when they threatened to hurt him.

headline.main: Prison Worker’s Husband, on ‘Today’ Show, Says Escapees Threatened to Kill Him
headline.print_headline: Husband Says Prison Employee Was in Over Her Head
